content.html: If we always approach problem solving from this perspective: it's from too much work => give them less work/time off we'll never really get to the crux of the problem. It's more nuanced than that.
content.value:
If we always approach problem solving from this perspective: 
it's from too much work => give them less work/time off

we'll never really get to the crux of the problem. It's more nuanced than that.
